description: Givebutter custom field configuration - maps to emoji custom fields in Givebutter

fields.name: 💸 Givebutter Page Setup
fields.description: Has the mentor completed the setup form?

fields.name: ✅ Mentor Training Signed Up?
fields.description: Has the mentor signed up for a training session?

fields.name: 📈 Fully Fundraised
fields.description: Has the mentor raised at least $75?

fields.name: 📱Custom Text Message 1️⃣
fields.description: Personalized text message based on mentor status

fields.name: 📧 Custom Email Message 1️⃣
fields.description: Personalized email message based on mentor status

fields.name: 💰 Amount Fundraised
fields.description: Total amount raised by the mentor

fields.name: 📱Custom Text Message 2️⃣
fields.description: Second personalized text message for campaigns

notes: Emoji field names must match exactly what's in Givebutter
To change for a new year: update 'year' field and add/remove fields as needed
The 'name' field is the exact column name in Givebutter CSV
Source indicates where the data comes from (mentor table field or generated)
